app.loading: The Rental Assistance Finder is loading
app.unavailable_message: Sorry, we are unable to display results right now.
app.unavailable_explanation: Please refresh this page and try again.

tribe.label: For your tribe or the tribal lands where you live (if applicable)
tribe.helper_text: Only tribes with rental assistance programs are listed.
tribe.placeholder: Select your tribe or tribal lands

single.explanation: We found a program that you may qualify for based on your selection. Check the program website or call to confirm you can apply.

single_geographic.explanation: We found a program that may provide rental assistance to your area. Check the program website or call to confirm you can apply.

filtered.count: Showing 1 program that may serve your area.
filtered.count_plural: Showing {{count}} programs that may serve your area.
filtered.explanation: Check the program website or call to confirm you can apply.
filtered.explanation_plural: To see if you qualify, start with the most local program first. Check the program website or call to confirm you can apply.

none.message: Sorry, we did not find a rental assistance program for your area.
none.explanation: Housing counselors can help you find resources in your area and make a plan.

links.text: Get advice about your legal rights
